Name: OutBreak: The Escape
About the game: OutBreak: The Escape is a Fps Survival Horror game, You play as a Marshall as you try to save your family While trying to escape a viral outbreak that occurred overnight in your hometown. With a small amount of ammunition and health lying around each level this Survival horror game will catch you by surprise.
